titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Women in the War Report, 1944
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Laura Streett

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Laura Streett December 2009

did.head: Collection Summary
did.physdesc: 0.2 cubic feet (1 box holding approximatley 600 pages)

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: Report of the research findings of Fairchild, Shyne, and Anthony on the effects of World War I on the role and status of women in the public and domestic spheres. The full title of the report is Women in the War: The Work of Women in the War and the American Household After the War.

bioghist.head: Administrative History
bioghist.p: The research was completed under the auspices of the Carola Woerishoffer Graduate Department of Social Economy and Social Research at Bryn Mawr College. The writers consulted a number of governmental agencies for statistics. Those agencies are listed in the acknowledgements.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Typescript report of the research findings of Fairchild, Shyne, and Anthony on the effects of World War I on the role and status of women in the public and domestic spheres.The full title of the report is Women in the War: The Work of Women in the War and the American Household After the War.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Ann W. Sharpe, August 1986.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Women in War Report, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.

dsc.head: Container List
dsc.p: There is no container list currently available for this collection.
